string.value: This is your first assignment as an informant. You wonder if #p1012111# of #m100000000# has been able to poinpoint the cause of the #o1210102#'s recent changes yet. Maybe you should go ask #p1012111# right now.

#p1012111# says that the reason for the #o1210102#'s strange behavior may be the ongoing conflict, and a potential war, between the #o1210102#s and the #o1210100#s. He asks you to look into the #o1210100#s as well and to gather #b50 #t4032340#s#k to aid his research...\r\n\r\n#i4032340# #t4032340# #b#c4032340# / 50#k

#p1012111#, who studied the #t4032340#s, came to the conclusion that the #o1210100#s are not properly prepared for combat, which of course threw out the whole theory of a possible monster war. He then asked you to stop by later since he'd like some time to come up with another hypothetical theory to explain this mess.

The more I think about it, the more I am stuck about the reason why the #o1210102#s have changed. I suspect that it might be a war within the monsters for supremacy. It's a well-known fact that #o1210102#s and #o1210100#s have had skirmishes over their territories.

But it's been years since the #o1210102#s and #o1210100#s signed a peace treaty, so I don't see that as a viable reason. If we're to really look into the reason why they're acting that way, then we'll also have to look into the #o1210100#s as well. You may have to go do more work.

I want you to eliminate #r#o1210100#s#k and gather up #b50 #t4032340#s#k for me. #t4032340#s are usually twirled up, but during a crisis, pigs get so stressed their tails turn straight. If we study #t4032340#s, we'll find out whether the #o1210100#s are also preparing for war.
Studying even the slightest of possibilites! Is that not the way of the scholar? Of course, you're not a scholar, but...you get what I mean.
Did you find 50 #t4032340#s? Then let's take a look at them. Hand me the tails.
Seeing that the #t4032340#s are still rolled up mean the #o1210100#s are not preparing for war. Then why are the #o1210102#s getting ready for battle? Hmmm. We're back to square one.
For now, I'll keep looking into the reason behind this chaos. It may take some time, so I suggest you keep hunting. I'll see you when you reach Level 15.
Have you not been able to gather 50 Pig Tails? I will need at least that many to come to a definitive conclusion...
